Description:
Our client is a Leading Company in the Entertainment Industry. They are now looking for a Technical Supervisor to join them.Roles & Responsibilities:Maximize operationality for all equipment within the parks
Assist in periodic checks and preventive maintenance on rides and playgrounds
Report and document all work accordingly
Assist in fault searching and problem solving in case of standstills in order to have the rides back in operation in a short time etc.Skills
Skills:
Must have experience in use of PLC systems
Must have experience in a theme-park environment
Must have experience in a system integration environment

Must have a minimum High School Diploma in engineering
Excellent command of both written and spoken English 
Hydraulics/ Pneumatics licenses or certificates of training
